definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: thus, as follows (BH [[כֵּן]]; Targum [[כֵּן]], Syr. ken);—usu. c. [[אֲמַר]] ([[אָמַ]], etc.; cf. Eg. Aram. CIS:ii. 149 A 1, B-C 3 REvS:492 B 5), Da 2:24 [[וְכֵן אֲמַר־לֵהּ]], v:Da 2:25, Da 4:11, Da 6:7, Da 7:5, Da 7:23, Ezr 5:3; Ezr 6:2 [[וְכֵן־כְּ תִיב בְּגַוַּהּ]].
